description:
Tama has discovered his true identity! What could it be? The cats gather and have a meeting regarding the strangeness of humans.  Tama and the gang find out what Takeshi`s and Kuramochi`s treasures are.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tama no Shoutai / Neko Kaigi / Boku no Taisetsu na Mono
Tama`s True Identity / Cat Meeting / My Treasure
タマの正体 / 猫会議 / ぼくの大切なもの
